response.overview: Few moments remembered throughout life, trigger the memory of where you were the day the news trickled through. September 11th 2001 remains one of those moments. The acts of 19 crazed individuals, driven by religious extremism, claimed the lives of thousands that day, exposing flaws in the defence of the mightiest nation on the globe. Observe and reflect on the darkest day in American history...as we recount those moments as it happened.
response.title: 9/11: As it Happened
